ONBOARD.DESC1: Execute Python code directly on your device

HOME.TITLE: Pyobide Python Basic Offline IDE
HOME.WELCOME: Welcome to Pyobide Python Basic Offline IDE
HOME.SUBTITLE: Your Offline Python Environment
HOME.IDE_DESCRIPTION: Write, edit, and run Python code with syntax highlighting and autocompletion.
HOME.LESSONS_DESCRIPTION: Learn Python programming with interactive tutorials and examples.

ABOUT.TITLE: About Pyobide Python Basic Offline IDE
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Your Offline Python Playground
ABOUT.FEATURE1_DESC: Pyobide Python Basic Offline IDE leverages the power of Ionic framework and Pyodide to bring Python execution directly to your mobile device. No internet required!
ABOUT.FEATURE2_DESC: Whether you're a student, developer, or just curious about Python, Pyobide Python Basic Offline IDE provides an intuitive environment to write, run, and experiment with code.
ABOUT.FEATURE3_DESC: Execute Python code instantly on your device with no data sent to external servers. Your code stays private and secure.
ABOUT.CONTACT_DESC: If you have any questions or feedback, feel free to reach out!

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY.COLLECT_DESC: Pyobide Python Basic Offline IDE is designed to run entirely offline. We do not collect, store, or transmit any personal information, code, or data from your device.
PRIVACY.USE_DESC: Since we don't collect any information, there is no usage of personal data. All Python code execution happens locally on your device using Pyodide.
PRIVACY.SECURITY_DESC: Your privacy is our priority. All code and data remain on your device. We recommend keeping your device secure to protect your information.
PRIVACY.THIRD_PARTY_DESC: Pyobide Python Basic Offline IDE does not integrate with any third-party services that collect user data. The app is self-contained and offline-first.
PRIVACY.CHANGES_DESC: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be reflected in the app and on this page.
PRIVACY.QUESTIONS_DESC: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us.

TERMS.TITLE: Terms of Service
TERMS.ACCEPTANCE_DESC: By using Pyobide Python Basic Offline IDE, you agree to these terms of service. If you do not agree, please do not use the app.
TERMS.USE_DESC: Pyobide Python Basic Offline IDE is provided for educational and personal use. You may use it to write and execute Python code offline. Commercial use is allowed as long as it complies with these terms.
TERMS.RESPONSIBILITY_DESC: You are responsible for the code you write and execute. Pyobide Python Basic Offline IDE is not liable for any damage caused by misuse of the app or execution of harmful code.
TERMS.DISCLAIMER_DESC: The app is provided "as is" without warranties. We do not guarantee uninterrupted service or error-free operation.
TERMS.LIABILITY_DESC: In no event shall Pyobide Python Basic Offline IDE or its developers be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from use of the app.
TERMS.CHANGES_DESC: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the app constitutes acceptance of updated terms.
TERMS.CONTACT_DESC: For questions about these terms, please contact us.

LESSONS.DESCRIPTION: Master Python with interactive lessons and examples
LESSONS.BASICS_DESC: Learn the fundamentals of Python programming
LESSONS.VARIABLES_DESC: Understanding variables, strings, numbers, and booleans
LESSONS.LOOPS_DESC: Master for loops, while loops, and conditional statements
LESSONS.FUNCTIONS_DESC: Create reusable code with functions and parameters
LESSONS.LISTS_DESC: Work with collections of data using lists and dictionaries

LESSON.NO_CHAPTERS: No chapters available for this lesson
LESSON.EXERCISES_DESC: Try these exercises to practice what you've learned
